properties.name: Albertina
properties.description: One of Vienna's premier museums. Originated as a collection of art presented a Habsburg family to in 1776.

properties.name: Sisi Museum
properties.description: Museum about cult figure Empress Elisabeth "Sisi" 1837-1898, wife of Emperor Franz Joseph

properties.name: Museum des Blindenwesens
properties.description: Guided tours by appointment. Development of teaching and learning aids for teaching blind people.

properties.name: Bank Austria Kunstforum
properties.description: Bank Austria Art Collection. Around 10,000 works and one of foremost collections of Austrian art.

properties.name: Ernst Fuchs Museum
properties.description: Museum dedicated to artist Ernst Fuchs.

properties.name: Architekturzentrum Wien
properties.description: Austrian Museum of Architecture and research centre focused on architecture and building culture.

properties.name: Jüdisches Museum Wien
properties.description: Museum raising awareness of Jewish history, religion, and culture in Vienna.

properties.name: Wiener Kriminalmuseum
properties.description: Vienna Crime Museum combined with the Museum of the Vienna Federal Police Directorate.

properties.name: Sigmund Freud Museum
properties.description: Museum dedicated to Sigmund Freud, founder of psychoanalysis.
